# limel-spinner

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                             | Type     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Determines the size of the spinner. Possible values: `mini`, `x-small`, `small`, `medium`, `large`. Defaults to `mini`. | `string` |
